definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be

sentences.english: The so-called tennis fracture is a fracture of the base of the 5. th metatarsal bone .
sentences.chinese: 所謂的網球性骨折，就是在第五跖骨基部的骨折。

sentences.english: So-called choices are just illusions which have never existed.
sentences.chinese: 所謂的選擇只是個未曾存在的虛像。
這就是所謂的同步化過程。

sentences.english: Some called the artist brave and hardworking.
sentences.chinese: 有些所謂的藝術家勤勞勇敢的。

sentences.english: Crowning "stars" among literary upstarts is killing them.
sentences.chinese: 把所謂“明星”捧做文唐袈貴即是抹殺他們。

sentences.english: The so - called poet ground out some verses.
sentences.chinese: 這個所謂的詩人搜索枯腸做成幾句詩。

sentences.english: Some media reports have argued that a strong China will pursue hegemony, and have made an issue of it.
sentences.chinese: 一些媒體炒作所謂中國“國強必霸”。

sentences.english: The other is to form'core-shell'structure that releases the static charge.
sentences.chinese: 形成所謂的“芯殼結構”來泄漏靜電荷。

sentences.english: So I guess he is what they call "natural late talker".
sentences.chinese: 所以我猜他是他們所謂的“語遲者”。

sentences.english: Thus, the actual residence and the property was formed between a so-called lease.
sentences.chinese: 因此，實際居住和財產之間形成一個所謂的租賃。

sentences.english: Each tooth has a space, the so-called pulp cavity.
sentences.chinese: 我們每顆牙齒裏面都有一個空間，即所謂的牙髓腔。

sentences.english: The so-called "green barriers" cannot be completely eliminated in a short term.
sentences.chinese: 所謂的“綠色壁壘”短期內沒可能完全消除。

sentences.english: By the 20th century, views similar to Berkeley's were called phenomenalism.
sentences.chinese: 到20世紀，類似伯克利的觀點是所謂的現象論。

sentences.english: Generally, a linear least squares problem leads to ihc solution of the so called normal equation.
sentences.chinese: 解線性最小二乘問題時，通常都要解所謂正規方程。

sentences.english: This is why the so-called Swans Hadith is definitely rejected.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲何所謂的冠鶴聖訓被完全拒絕的原因。

sentences.english: To their surprise, the so-called investor is a swindler.
sentences.chinese: 令他們喫驚的是，那個所謂的投資商是騙子。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
